item.title: Cannon only hits people?
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

ok here is the thing on my server

case 6: //Cannon - Reposted and Recoded by Newb 2341 if(actionTimer <= 1){ if(cowner() == true){ hasSetCannon = false; if (playerHasItem(2)) { deleteItem(2, getItemSlot(2), 1); attackPlayersWithin(60, 40, 10); attackPlayersWithin(305, 40, 10); attackPlayersWithin(567, 40, 10); attackPlayersWithin(406, 40, 10); stillgfx(199, absY, absX); hitDiff = 8 + misc.random(22); inCombat(); addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[4]), 4); sendMessage("You shot the cannon at a player!"); txt4 = "Fire!"; string4UpdateRequired = true; actionTimer = 45; } else sendMessage("You need more ammo!"); } if(cowner() == false){ sendMessage("This is not your cannon!"); } else { sendMessage("Don't click to fast!"); } } break;
but it only hits people, how do i make it attack monsters also
